sample_pairs.legal_text: The plaintiff has filed a writ petition under Article 32 of the Constitution seeking mandamus against the respondent.
sample_pairs.simplified_text: The person who filed the case has asked the court to order the other party to do something using constitutional rights.

sample_pairs.legal_text: The court granted an interim injunction restraining the defendant from proceeding with the construction.
sample_pairs.simplified_text: The court gave a temporary order stopping the person being sued from continuing the building work.

sample_pairs.legal_text: The appellant contends that the lower court erred in not considering the precedent established in the landmark judgment.
sample_pairs.simplified_text: The person appealing says the lower court made a mistake by not looking at what was decided in an important previous case.
